test.name: ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.InvalidFormShouldHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "Single valid required field", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug]] })
ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.InvalidFormShouldHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "Single invalid field", TestCase = [[thisIsInvalidKey, this-should-not-work]] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "All required fields and no optionals", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Name]] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "All required fields and 1 optional", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Very Own Name], [email, foo@example.com]] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "All required fields, 1 optional and many empty opt"..., TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Very Own Name], [email, foo@example.com], [url, ], ...] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "Valid required fields with invalid url value", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Very Own Name], [url, this-is-invalid-url]] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "Valid required fields with single invalid field", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Very Own Name], [thisIsInvalidKey, this-should-be-okay]] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "All fields in reverse order", TestCase = [[score, 0.5], [avatar, http://www.example.com/avatar.png], [url, http://www.example.com], [email, foo@example.com], [name, My Very Own Name], ...] })

ApplicationCore.Tests.CommentFormTests.ValidFormShouldNotHaveErrors(testCase: MemberDataSerializer`1 { Description = "All required fields and all optionals", TestCase = [[postId, this-is-a-post-slug], [message, This is the message], [name, My Very Own Name], [email, foo@example.com], [url, http://www.example.com], ...] })
